channel.title: Basics :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: Discover what this Hugo theme is all about and the core-concepts behind it.

item.title: What's New
item.description: This document shows you what’s new in the latest release and flags it with one of the following badges.

item.title: Requirements
item.description: Thanks to the simplicity of Hugo, this page is as empty as this theme needs requirements.

item.title: Installation
item.description: The following steps are here to help you initialize your new website.

item.title: Configuration
item.description: On top of Hugo’s global configuration options, the Relearn theme lets you define further options unique to the theme in your hugo.

item.title: Branding
item.description: The Relearn theme provides configuration options to change your site’s colors, favicon and logo.

item.title: Customization
item.description: Usage scenarios The theme is usable in different scenarios, requiring the following mandatory settings in your hugo.

item.title: Stylesheet generator
item.description: This interactive tool may help you to generate your own color variant stylesheet.

item.title: Topbar Modification
item.description: The theme comes with a reasonably configured topbar. Nevertheless, your requirements may differ from this configuration.

item.title: History
item.description: Changelog 6.1.1 (2024-08-02) Fixes [bug] link: link resolving stopped working in certain configurations #882 6.
